PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-00932010-01-26FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActBretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
Subject1.2 billion Special Drawing Rights ** International Monetary Fund **
PrecisOrder fixing the sum of money that is equivalent to 1.2 billion Special Drawing Rights the maximum amount that the Minister of Finance may lend to the INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND for the purposes of funding the IMF's Poverty Reduction and Growth Facility and Exogenous Shock Facility Trust.
AttachmentsAttachment
